function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delays in project completion due to lockdown and high-risk personnel","Impact":"Increased project costs and financial losses","Mitigation":"Support high-risk personnel and create contingency plans for lockdown situations","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, project management tools","People":"High-risk personnel, project staff","Owner":"Project managers, HR department"},{"Description":"Communication challenges between off-site manager and on-site team","Impact":"Reduced efficiency and coordination, potential errors in construction","Mitigation":"Utilize advanced communication technologies for virtual site visits and real-time data sharing","Technologies":"Video chat, online meeting platforms, 3D modeling","People":"Off-site manager, on-site team, construction personnel","Owner":"Project managers, technology department"},{"Description":"Reliance on digital tools for construction coordination","Impact":"Dependency on technology for coordination and visualization","Mitigation":"Ensure robust digital infrastructure, provide training for using digital tools effectively","Technologies":"BIM, 3D modeling, digital communication tools","People":"Design team, BIM team, construction personnel","Owner":"Technology department, project managers"}]}
